paper_abstract: In this paper, the compactness of differences of two weighted composition operators on the space of bounded analytic functions on the open unit ball in the uniform operator topology is characterized. A sufficient condition when two weighted composition operators lie in the same component of the space of nonzero weighted composition operators on H-infinity(B-N), which is denoted by C-w(H-infinity(B-N)), is established as well.
paper_title: COMPACT DIFFERENCES OF WEIGHTED COMPOSITION OPERATORS ON H-infinity(B-N)
